dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3276677D] stolen content
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern: Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA"). Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim. Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringeme nt%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf Legal Response Team THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC. -----Original Message----- From: abuse@ev1servers.net [mailto:abuse@ev1servers.net] Sent: Wednesday, February 28, 2007 6:29 PM To: DMCA Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3276677D] stolen content ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. stolen content Added by system at Wednesday, Feb 28 2007 06:35 pm X-MailFrom: bigredcouch@gmail.com X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [216.12.192.67] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Wed Feb 28 18:34:57 2007 Received: (qmail 20126 invoked by alias); 1 Mar 2007 00:34:57 -0000 Delivered-To: abuse@inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net Received: (qmail 20094 invoked from network); 1 Mar 2007 00:34:33 -0000 Received: from smtp02.theplanet.com (70.87.6.111) by inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net with SMTP; 1 Mar 2007 00:34:33 -0000 Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by smtp02.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Wed, 28 Feb 2007 18:34:32 -0600 Return-path: Delivery-date: Wed, 28 Feb 2007 18:34:32 -0600 Received: from mx02.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.181] helo=mx02.filter.theplanet.com) by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from bigredcouch@gmail.com) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1HMZFf-0002LU-6a for abuse@theplanet.com; Wed, 28 Feb 2007 18:34:32 -0600 Received: from an-out-0708.google.com ([209.85.132.251]) by mx02.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from bigredcouch@gmail.com) with esmtp (Exim) id 1HMZFZ-000KbV-5U for abuse@theplanet.com; Wed, 28 Feb 2007 18:34:26 -0600 Received: by an-out-0708.google.com with SMTP id b38so248807ana for ; Wed, 28 Feb 2007 16:34:23 -0800 (PST) DKIM-Signature: a=rsa-sha1; c=relaxed/relaxed; d=gmail.com; s=beta; h=domainkey-signature:received:received:message-id:date:from:to:subject: mime-version:content-type; b=GOc6wRsQOOf1DfRvZsVJIE02D8CRZTIJKi7Nxos2vG0C2tkDTXHlv8gjZur4pgEpIoC6k7 UhJPz2QLDmLPCKFznY7pVdCrHoeQGQcz7Ch1XAvr2NJj5zZ/F3VjkS2rRQuQjL6C1Y+bFJ8o r1zJ8v2UGIb8QfFbE5ss/VpWo7634= DomainKey-Signature: a=rsa-sha1; c=nofws; d=gmail.com; s=beta; h=received:message-id:date:from:to:subject:mime-version:content-type; b=O9gfJVZousqO+hbbK/zGSWhyfK6DVF0tDEC0BANqOfKIbg0LilsQuT43NGOgoQ1g9o/GFN RMsddx5iSl+w+GgPZG8Rp21N7WdXlgi7dDpXzSbrXtuwAjiT+Pgso2Ie8Ef8joZXWPuGAcYg uE4BJCa28A2fyPs5hL14vznZiPlvo= Received: by 10.100.143.1 with SMTP id q1mr1095336and.1172709263063; Wed, 28 Feb 2007 16:34:23 -0800 (PST) Received: by 10.100.9.9 with HTTP; Wed, 28 Feb 2007 16:34:22 -0800 (PST) Message-ID: Date: Wed, 28 Feb 2007 19:34:22 -0500 From: Angie To: abuse@theplanet.com Subject: stolen content MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/mixed; boundary="----=_Part_16879_15654806.1172709262745" Received-SPF: pass (mx02.filter.theplanet.com: domain of gmail.com designates 209.85.132.251 as permitted sender) client-ip=209.85.132.251; envelope-from=bigredcouch@gmail.com; helo=an-out-0708.google.com; X-OriginalArrivalTime: 01 Mar 2007 00:34:32.0677 (UTC) FILETIME=[6178A950:01C75B99] (multipart/mixed) (multipart/alternative) MIME element (text/plain) To Whom It may Concern, I am writing to you in reference to a website that is listed under whois as being hosted on your name server. ReferralServer: rwhois://rwhois.theplanet.com:4321 NetRange: 70.84.0.0 - 70.87.255.255 CIDR: 70.84.0.0/14 NetName: NETBLK-THEPLANET-BLK-13 NetHandle: NET-70-84-0-0-1 Parent: NET-70-0-0-0-0 NetType: Direct Allocation NameServer: NS1.THEPLANET.COM NameServer: NS2.THEPLANET.COM Comment: RegDate: 2004-07-29 Updated: 2006-02-17 The website is http://www.optionmortgagetalk.info . One of the many pages in question is http://www.optionmortgagetalk.info/Mommie.htm . Please scroll down the page and do not take the information at the top as the page content. On this page and several others is content that has been hotlinked and copied directly from my website (#99 at the bottom of the page). The photos in question I have broken the links but there are photos of other children there as well. I was in contact with the other mother(s) and they too are working to break the links to photos of their own children. (see attached screenshots optiontalkcontent1.jpg, my content1.jpg, and sidebyside1.jpg) This site seems to serve no purpose at all. It has stolen content but also has violated me in so many ways by taking photos of my child that were of no interest to anyone but my friends and family. I am enclosing screen shots of the properties value of the removed images to show they had been taken directly from my website in my sons birthday post located at http://www.bigredcouch.com/journal/archives/2007/02/full_circle.html . (see attached "properties.jpg") If you further follow the links below the entries with those photos of children you will find that you will come across porn content among the jumble of other stolen content. Not hidden by any means and very visible to anyone who wishes to see it. http://www.optionmortgagetalk.info/Full.htm (see screenshot porn.jpg) Another page in question is http://www.optionmortgagetalk.info/Danijela.htm . On this page you will find photos that have been taken from http://mooncookie.blogspot.com/index.html with a copyright that is owned by ANGELA PERGE and can be contacted at angela.perge@sbcglobal.net. The link title of #99 takes you directly to my site and the page the content was taken from. The other links from blogger applications are broken and fail to return you to the rightful owner of the images and content. I have spent time today trying to track down and contact the women who are using blogger for their blogging tool. I am asking you to please suspend this site. Not only has the person(s) stolen my and others copyright written content but they have posted photos of our children that in no way shape or form belong to them. There is no reasonable explaination for my sons photos to appear on any other website outside of my own. In this day and age of internet pornography the least bit of tampering with photos of children immediately lends on to the belief that something is not on the up and up. As this website is registered in Bangkok it further highlights the possibility as they are out of the jurisdiction of the US justice system. This website is far out of line in its method of obtaining content. I hope you will take this seriously and understand my concern as a parent and as a website owner of copyright materials. Sincerely, -Angela Rapids, owner, bigredcouch.com attachements following MIME element (text/html)
To Whom It may Concern,
 
I am writing to you in reference to a website that is listed under whois as being hosted on your name server.
 
ReferralServer: rwhois://rwhois.theplanet.com:4321

NetRange:   70.84.0.0 - 70.87.255.255
CIDR:       70.84.0.0/14
NetName:    NETBLK-THEPLANET-BLK-13
NetHandle:  NET-70-84-0-0-1
Parent:     NET-70-0-0-0-0
NetType:    Direct Allocation
NameServer: NS1.THEPLANET.COM
NameServer: NS2.THEPLANET.COM
Comment: & nbsp; 
RegDate:    2004-07-29
Updated:    2006-02-17
 
 
The website is http://www.optionmortgagetalk.info . One of the many pages in question is http://www.optionmortgagetalk.info/Mommie.htm  .
 
Please scroll down the page and do not take the information at the top as the page content.

On this page and several others is content that has been hotlinked and copied directly from my website (#99 at the bottom of the page). The photos in question I have broken the links but there are photos of other children there as well. I was in contact with the other mother(s) and they too are working to break the links to photos of their own children. (see attached screenshots optiontalkcontent1.jpg, my content1.jpg, and sidebyside1.jpg)

This site seems to serve no purpose at all. It has stolen content but also has violated me in so many ways by taking photos of my child that were of no interest to anyone but my friends and family.
 
I am enclosing screen shots of the properties value of the removed images to show they had been taken directly from my website in my sons birthday post located at
http://www.bigredcouch.com/journal/archives/2007/02/full _circle.html  . (see attached "properties.jpg")
 
If you further follow the links below the entries with those photos of children you will find that you will come across porn content among the jumble of other stolen content. Not hidden by any means and very visible to anyone who wishes to see it. http://www.optionmortgagetalk.info/Full.htm (se e screenshot porn.jpg)
 
Another page in question is http://www.optionmortgagetalk.info/Danijela.htm  ;. On this page you will find photos that have been taken from http://mooncookie.blogspot.com/index.html with a copyright that is owned by ANGELA PERGE  and can be contacted at angela.perge@sbcglobal.net .
 
The link title of  #99 takes you directly to my site and the page the content was taken from. The other links from blogger applications are broken and fail to return you to the rightful owner of the images and content. I have spent time today trying to track down and  contact the women who are using blogger for their blogging tool.
 
I am asking you to please suspend this site. Not only has the person(s) stolen my and others copyright written content but they have posted photos of our children that in no way shape or form belong to them. There is no reasonable explaination for my sons photos to appear on any other website outside of my own.
 
In this day and age of internet pornography the least bit of tampering with photos of children immediately lends on to the belief that something is not on the up and up. As this website is registered in Bangkok it further highlights the possibility as they are out of the jurisdiction of the US justice system.
 
This website is far out of line in its method of obtaining content. I hope you will take this seriously and understand my concern as a parent and as a website owner of copyright materials.
 
Sincerely,
 
-Angela Rapids,
owner, bigredcouch.com
 
 
attachements following
